mapper.select: SELECT cardno,mobile,addmoney,billtime FROM cg_bill_moneycard WHERE cardno=#{cardno} AND mobile=#{mobile} AND paystate="1";
SELECT cardno,consumetype,keyno,intime,timeminute,paid FROM cg_record_consume WHERE cardno=#{cardno} AND (consumetype="羽毛球" or consumetype="篮球" or consumetype="乒乓球" ) AND checkstate="1";
select cardno,consumetype,keyno,billtime,timeminute,paid from cg_record_consume where cardno=#{cardno} AND (consumetype="商品" or consumetype="游泳") AND checkstate="1";
SELECT cardno,consumetype,keyno,intime,timeminute,paid FROM cg_record_consume WHERE cardno=#{cardno} AND intime >= #{starttime} AND outtime <= #{endtime} AND checkstate="1";
